hero.title: Transform Your Yard with Campos Landscaping Maintenance
hero.subtitle: Reliable and Affordable Landscaping Services for a Beautiful Outdoor Space.

features.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
features.desc: Expert mowing, edging, fertilization, and weed control for a lush, green lawn.

features.title: Landscape Design & Installation
features.desc: Create the outdoor oasis of your dreams with our custom landscape design and installation services.

features.title: Spring & Fall Clean-Up
features.desc: Prepare your yard for the changing seasons with our comprehensive clean-up services.

reviews.author: John S.
reviews.text: Campos Landscaping has transformed my yard! Their team is professional, reliable, and does excellent work. I highly recommend them!

reviews.author: Maria G.
reviews.text: We've been using Campos Landscaping for years, and they consistently provide top-notch service. Our lawn always looks amazing!
